title: Ivanti security advisory (AV25-581)
description: On September 9, 2025, Ivanti published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Ivanti Endpoint Manager  version 2022 SU8 Security Update 1 and prior
Ivanti Endpoint Manager  version 2024 SU3 and prior
Ivanti Connect Secure  version 22.7R2.8 and prior
Ivanti Policy Secure  version 22.7R1.4 and prior
Neurons for Secure Access  version 22.8R1.3 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
